title: Adamantine Mace
content:
ile holding it.

A nimble mace, heavy with the promise of broken bones.

Adamantine Mace Location & Where to Find

Location: Can be found at Grymforge, during The Adamantine Forge Quest. Quest: The Adamantine Forge Crafting: You need the Mace Mould and Mithral Ore to forge the Mace.

Adamantine Mace Notes & Tips

Rarity: Rare Value: 190 Gp. Weight: 1.8 Kg. ID: df08ec01-52f0-4fdf-b5e7-4fa0970a480a

Weapons Adamantine Longsword ♦ Adamantine Scimitar ♦ Air Myrmidon Flail ♦ Allandra's Whelm ♦ Ambush
